markdownRemark.html: Published in celebration of works produced within University of Edinburgh, winnnig the Grierson Verse Prize in 2016.

frontmatter.title: January Diary
frontmatter.snippet: 20th Blackford Hill this morning, sky unwashed, it hovered over the hoar-frosted grass where the dog ran to exhaustion. Now he wakes only to be fed or briefly patted, before shambling back to the bathroom, dropping at the altar of the sink, limbs angled in something like worship.
